definition: to congregate in one hall (idiom); to gather under one roof
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Linguists from all over the country assembled at the symposium.
sentences.chinese: 研讨会上全国的语言学家济济一堂。

sentences.english: Participants from different parts of the world have come to compete and win the prestigious title of the Big Fish Hunter.
sentences.chinese: 来自各地的参赛者济济一堂，都来争夺钓鱼王的称号。

sentences.english: The chaplain came and preaches to a packed church.
sentences.chinese: 牧师来了，向济济一堂的教友们布了道。

sentences.english: The guests gathered in the banquet hall, the Great Hall of the People, which was filled with warm and festive atmosphere. The national emblem was placed above the podium.
sentences.chinese: 人民大会堂宴会厅内宾朋济济一堂，气氛喜庆热烈。

definition: to get together all at once
to gather/to assemble
surrounded by distinguished friends (idiom); in company
to gather happily under one roof
to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
to cooperate on a great undertaking or joint project
a magnificent and unprecedented event (idiom)
large number of people
to discuss matters of vital importance
guests filled all the seats (idiom); a house full of distinguished visitors
to talk freely
to arrive (esp. of notable person)/to visit (more formal than 光臨|光临[guang1 lin2])
to participate in a meeting
to attend a ritual
guests/visitors
to be present at a meeting
